``` {r install_packages}
install.packages('openxlsx')

```

```{r joining}

# Read CSV into R
data1 <- read.xlsx("data/QMB3250_1_2014-01-13_2014-01-19.xlsx")
data2 <- read.xlsx("data/QMB3250_1_2014-01-20_2014-01-26.xlsx")

#MyData <- read.csv(file="c:/TheDataIWantToReadIn.csv", header=TRUE, sep=",")

total <- merge(data1, data2, by=c("USER_NAME","UFID", "Section_No"))

write.xlsx(total, file="output/output.xlsx", sheetName="USA Arrests")

```
